resources.string: Applocker provides a secure way to lock your applications.

This application uses the volume key pattern to lock down your applications.The third user does not even know if the application is locked. Hence providing maximum privacy to the user. Applocker is free, easy to use and completely reliable. Now hide all the personal information from the external threats and without any worries.

The application is submitted as a "Mini Project", to the Information Technology Department of Yeshwantrao Chavan College Of Engineering, Nagpur. Applocker is developed under the guidance of Prof. Swati Kale, by Priyanka Uppalwar, Meghna Bhalotia, Krinjal Wankhede, Chaya Mahale and Himanshu Madavi. The project is co-ordinated by Prof. Nisha Wankhede.

string-array.name: instruction_strings
string-array.item: Lock Applications:\nSwipe the application from unlocked list to right.
Update List:\nJust pull down the list to refresh.
Remove Locked Application:\nSwipe application to right.
Change Key:\nTap on Set Password, select number of keys, press your volume button pattern twice.
Wrong Unlocking Key:\nJust tap on the screen and try again.
